titleStmt.title: The philosophers satyrs, written by M. Robert Anton, of Magdelen Colledge in Cambridge
titleStmt.author: Anton, Robert, b. 1584 or 5.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[reede] and B[ernard] A[lsop] for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleetstreet, ouer against the great Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Fleetstreet, ouer against the great Conduit
